Class XmlInputStream

A forward-only stream used to read and write XML data.

Inheritance
System.Object
XmlInputStream

Namespace: Figaro
Assembly: Figaro.dll
Syntax
public sealed class XmlInputStream : IDisposable
Remarks

You can obtain an instance of this object using one of CreateLocalFileInputStream(String), CreateMemBufInputStream(String, String), or CreateUrlInputStream(String, String).

You use instances of this class with PutDocument(String, UpdateContext), and SetContentAsInputStream(XmlInputStream).

You can manually retrieve the contents of the input stream using XmlInputStream::readBytes and XmlInputStream::curPos.

ReadBytes(UInt32)

Reads the specified number of bytes from the input stream and returns those bytes in an array.

Declaration
public byte[] ReadBytes(uint byteCount)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.UInt32 byteCount

The number of bytes to read. If this number is greater than the number of available bytes, then only the available bytes will be returned.
Returns
Type Description
System.Byte[]

A byte array of the input stream.
